github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Put commits in this format <name of file changeed> => <what was changed>
If multiple files are changed, add a newline and the name of the file
Add a line separator between the files and the message
Add an emojee in the beginning of the changed file name
for updated code or refactored code use gear emojee
for new code use star emojee
for code cleanup use broom emojee

github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: All the functions should have JSDocs with proper return types
all the classes should have JSDocs
package.json should have prettier format command
npx cypress run or open command should have --browser edge
A method should not have too many params
see if a variable can be declared as const
check if a variable can be inline
check for debug statements like console.log/cy.log
